mapper.select: select photo_id,name,suffix,path,description,information,user_id,album_id,likes,is_public,size,width,height,in_recycle_bin,original_time,upload_time,delete_time from photo where user_id=#{userId} and in_recycle_bin=0 and exists(select 1 from face where photo.photo_id=face.photo_id) order by original_time desc,upload_time desc limit #{begin},50

select photo_id,name,suffix,path,thumbnail_path,description,information,user_id,album_id,likes,is_public,size,width,height,in_recycle_bin,original_time,upload_time,delete_time from photo where photo_id=#{photoId} and is_public=1
select photo_id from photo where album_id=#{albumId}
mapper.update: update photo set album_id=#{albumId} where photo_id=#{photoId}
update photo set in_recycle_bin=1,delete_time=#{time} where photo_id=#{photoId}
update photo set is_public=#{isPublic} where photo_id=#{photoId}
mapper.select: select photo_id,name,suffix,path,description,information,user_id,album_id,likes,is_public,size,width,height,in_recycle_bin,original_time,upload_time,delete_time from photo where album_id=#{albumId} and in_recycle_bin=0 order by upload_time desc

select photo_id,name,suffix,path,description,information,user_id,album_id,likes,is_public,size,width,height,in_recycle_bin,original_time,upload_time,delete_time from photo where album_id=#{albumId} and in_recycle_bin=0 order by upload_time desc limit #{begin},50
select 1 from photo where photo_id=#{photoId} and in_recycle_bin=1;

select photo_id,name,suffix,path,description,information,user_id,album_id,likes,is_public,size,width,height,in_recycle_bin,original_time,upload_time,delete_time from photo where user_id=#{userId} and in_recycle_bin=1 order by delete_time desc
mapper.update: update photo set in_recycle_bin=0,delete_time=null where photo_id=#{photoId}
mapper.select: SELECT photo_id FROM photo WHERE delete_time <= (SELECT DATE_SUB(now(),interval 30 day));

select photo_id,name,suffix,path,description,information,user_id,album_id,likes,is_public,size,width,height,in_recycle_bin,original_time,upload_time,delete_time from photo where user_id=#{userId} and in_recycle_bin=0 order by upload_time desc limit #{begin},50
select photo_id from photo where path=#{path}
mapper.update: update photo set likes=likes+#{amount} where photo_id=#{photoId}
mapper.select: select photo_id,name,suffix,path,description,information,user_id,album_id,likes,is_public,size,width,height,in_recycle_bin,original_time,upload_time,delete_time from photo where user_id=#{userId} and in_recycle_bin=0 order by original_time desc,upload_time desc

select photo_id,name,suffix,path,description,information,user_id,album_id,likes,is_public,size,width,height,in_recycle_bin,original_time,upload_time,delete_time from photo where is_public=1 and in_recycle_bin=0 order by likes desc limit #{limit}

SELECT * FROM landmark WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM photo JOIN photo_landmark_relation ON photo.photo_id = photo_landmark_relation.photo_id WHERE photo_landmark_relation.landmark_id = landmark.landmark_id AND photo.user_id = #{userId} AND photo.in_recycle_bin = 0)
